channel.title: StockHedges
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from StockHedges, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Bitcoin Falls After Failing to Breach $100,000 Mark
item.description: Bitcoin prices extended their fall after failing to breach the $100,000-mark that many traders had been betting on, Zaye Capital Markets said.

item.title: One of the Hottest Stocks in the Oil Patch is a Defunct 19th-Century Railroad
item.description: A new approach to wringing cash from its swath of desert has Texas Pacific Land shares soaring.

item.title: Intuit shares drop as quarterly forecast misses estimates due to delayed revenue
item.description: While Intuit reiterated its full-year view, the company said promotional changes in the current quarter will have implications for revenue timing.

item.title: Trump Tariff Threat Stirs Markets
item.description: U.S. stock futures were little changed after Donald Trump pledged he would slap steep tariffs on Mexico, Canada and China soon after taking office, bu...

item.title: The Hardest Part of Cashing In Bitcoin Is Getting the Taxes Right
item.description: The IRS is stepping up oversight as bitcoin surges near $100,000. Tax audits and criminal cases are happening more often, and new rules starting next ...

item.title: Nvidia nearly doubles revenue on strong AI demand
item.description: Nvidia reported earnings after the bell. Here are the results.

item.title: Zoom surpasses expectations and calls for another quarter of single-digit growth
item.description: Zoom's business is still growing, but not nearly at the rate of expansion during the Covid-19 pandemic.

item.title: Gap shares surge as it raises guidance, touts 'strong start' to holiday
item.description: Gap said Old Navy's sales fell after hurricanes led to store closures and warm weather deterred sales in its kids category.

item.title: Macy's delays earnings release as it says employee hid up to $154 million in delivery expenses
item.description: Macy's delayed its results after it discovered an issue related to the reporting of delivery expenses.

item.title: Metal Prices Fall; Medium-Term Outlook Still Bullish
item.description: Base metals were lower and JPMorgan said the market will be bearish in the near term as the pricing in of a risk premium for tariffs on China likely s...
